message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.CE 

This paper discusses vulnerabilities in a secret sharing scheme, which falls under the category of cryptography (cs.CR). The analysis involves the efficiency of the scheme, which could also be related to information theory (cs.IT) and computational complexity (cs.CC). The proposed alternative scheme and attacks involve algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) and computer engineering (cs.CE).
